lead_paragraph: The Olympic sprint champion Justin Gatlin has appealed his four-year doping suspension in an attempt to return to the track for the Beijing Games in August. The notice was filed Monday to the Court of Arbitration for Sport, the international body that has the final say in such matters. A United States arbitration panel earlier this month reduced Gatlin’s potential eight-year ban to four, but Gatlin wants a further reduction.
